mentions.tacticalSituation: The Labour Party are in a distant third place… | A vote for Will Forster and the Lib Dems is the only way to beat the Conservatives here in Woking Constituency. | At the most recent European elections, the Lib Dems won Woking. They have real momentum going into the forthcoming General Election. | According to the latest opinion polls, the next General Election in Woking will be very close between the Tories and Lib Dems. | Labour have never won Woking and cannot win this time. If just a few Labour voters switch and back the Lib Dems, the Conservatives will lose. | Local people now have a real chance to elect a local Lib Dem as their MP who will stand up for all of Woking and its surrounding villages. | Whatever happens nationally, elections in Woking Constituency are always between the Conservatives and Lib Dems.

examples: At the most recent European elections, the Lib Dems won Woking.
According to the latest opinion polls, the next General Election in Woking will be very close between the Tories and Lib Dems.
They have real momentum going into the forthcoming General Election.
Labour have never won Woking and cannot win this time.
Local people now have a real chance to elect a local Lib Dem as their MP who will stand up for all of Woking and its surrounding villages.
Whatever happens nationally, elections in Woking Constituency are always between the Conservatives and Lib Dems.
If just a few Labour voters switch and back the Lib Dems, the Conservatives will lose.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Local people now have a real chance to elect a local Lib Dem as their MP who will stand up for all of Woking and its surrounding villages.

examples: Local people now have a real chance to elect a local Lib Dem as their MP who will stand up for all of Woking and its surrounding villages.
